tongue.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the soft part inside your mouth that you can move about and use for eating and speaking
tongue.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Joe ran his tongue over his dry lips.
The taste of the chocolate was still on her tongue.
The girl scowled at me, then stuck out her tongue.
tongue.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Anton lapsed into his own tongue when he was excited.

tongue.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the tongue of a cow or sheep, cooked and eaten cold
tongue.translation[0].definitions[3].def: something that has a long thin shape
tongue.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: Huge tongues of fire were licking the side of the building.
tongue.translation[0].definitions[4].def: the part of a shoe that lies on top of your foot, under the part where you tie it
tongue.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to use your tongue to make separate sounds when playing a musical instrument
tongue.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to touch something with your tongue
